class.name: OScriptNodeSceneNode
class.brief_description: Returns a reference to a scene node by [NodePath].
class.description: The [OScriptNodeSceneNode] returns a reference a scene node using the specified [NodePath]. An [OScriptNodeSceneNode] can be created by dragging a scene node from the editor's scene tree dock onto the orchestration graph canvas. If the [NodePath] associated with the node needs to be adjusted, the [param node_path] property can be modified in the inspector. If the scene node cannot be found in the scene at runtime, the node returns [code]null[/code].
